metadata.name: Tripod
metadata.description:
[Art by Steven Messing](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0582205/)

  They have been hibernating in the underground for millenia. The recent aggravation of global warming has made it impossible for the Tripod Mellos to rest any longer, and they don't like being disturbed…

  Album: Joytime I

 ♫ Bounce (Special Remix)

 Each holder of a CrystalMello token will be invited to join one (1), ninety (90) minute virtual album listening party with Marshmello. In addition, this token is verifiable for:

 One (1) Marshmello x [Aaron Kai Painted Helmet](https://twitter.com/ThisIsAito/status/1394798460654739460)

 Two (2) Premium Vegas Residency tickets with additional backstage access to meet Marshmello
